github.http
Class GithubHttpPlay

java.lang.Object
  github.http.GithubHttpPlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
GithubHttp
public class GithubHttpPlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements GithubHttp

Default implementation of GithubHttp use playframework WS to provide access over http.
This implementation is synchronous and each method call can throw an GithubTimeoutException

Author:
Vivian Pennel
See Also:
GithubTimeoutException, GithubHttp, WS
